meanings.definition: Make (something secret or concealed) known to others.
meanings.sent1: She unveiled her surprise gift to her friend.
meanings.sent2: The magician unveiled his latest trick to the audience.
meanings.sent3: The cat unveiled its hiding spot behind the curtains, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: The detective unveiled the truth behind the mysterious disappearance.
meanings.sent5: The artist unveiled his masterpiece, leaving everyone in awe.

meanings.definition: Remove a veil or covering from (something).
meanings.sent1: The bride unveiled her face as she walked down the aisle.
meanings.sent2: The sculptor unveiled the statue after months of work.
meanings.sent3: The sun unveiled its bright rays after the storm passed.
meanings.sent4: The chef unveiled the dish, revealing a culinary masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The painter unveiled the canvas, showcasing a beautiful landscape.
